   sphinx-quickstart on Sun Aug 27 13:58:34 2023.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

TCutility |ProjectVersion| documentation
========================================

**TCutility** is a Python library containing many helper functions and classes for use in programs written in the TheoCheM group.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3
   :caption: Main modules

   tcutility.results
   tcutility.job
   analysis/analysis

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Utility modules

   api/tcutility.constants
   api/tcutility.data
   api/tcutility.log
   api/tcutility.slurm
   api/tcutility.molecule
   api/tcutility.formula
   api/tcutility.cache
   api/tcutility.geometry
   api/tcutility.report

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Full API

   api/modules

==================

* :ref:`genindex`

.. note::

   This library is under heavy development, so there are no guarantees that older code will work with newer versions.
